keyword: calories in mcd ice cream cone
title: Calories in McD Ice Cream Cone
meta_description: Discover calories in mcd ice cream cone, including full nutrition breakdown like carbs, protein, fat, and quick tweaks for variations.
h1: Calories in McD Ice Cream Cone
assumptions: McDonald's standard vanilla reduced-fat ice cream in a cone; no additional toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, serving size, and customizations; check McDonald's app or site for latest values.

quick_answer.text: One McDonald's vanilla ice cream cone contains about 200 calories and 5 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Strawberry sundae topping instead of plain

faqs.q: How many calories in a McD ice cream cone?
faqs.a: About 200 calories for one standard vanilla cone.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in mcd ice cream cone?
faqs.a: 34 g total carbs, including 25 g sugars and 0 g fiber.

faqs.q: Is McD ice cream cone high in fat?
faqs.a: 5 g total fat, with 3 g saturated; it's relatively low-fat.

faqs.q: How much protein in mcd ice cream cone?
faqs.a: 5 g protein per cone from the dairy.

faqs.q: Does size affect calories in mcd ice cream cone?
faqs.a: Standard cone is 200 kcal; larger portions or dips increase it significantly.
